title.rendered: Kind Words for Cruel Times – album cover

content.rendered: The Reverse released their new album Kind Words for Cruel Times last week. It’s got my photo on the cover, but that’s not the only reason I recommend it :-) It’s a great listen with intelligent lyrics and catchy melodies. You can check it out on iTunes here.

excerpt.rendered:
The Reverse released their new album Kind Words for Cruel Times last week. It’s got my photo on the cover, but that’s not the only reason I recommend it :-) …
